meanings.definition: The things that are held or included in something.
meanings.sent1: The contents of the box were a surprise gift.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the contents of the letter.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the box, spilling its contents everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His speech had the contents of a heartfelt confession.
meanings.sent5: The contents of the treasure chest sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The chapters or sections of a book or document.
meanings.sent1: The contents of the novel were thrilling and captivating.
meanings.sent2: He quickly flipped through the contents of the textbook.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally mixed up the contents of the lesson plan.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a book with the contents of a mystery waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The contents of the encyclopedia covered a wide range of topics.

meanings.definition: The substance or material inside a container.
meanings.sent1: The contents of the jar smelled delicious.
meanings.sent2: He poured out the contents of the bag onto the table.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat, surprising everyone with its contents.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt heavy with the contents of unspoken words.
meanings.sent5: The contents of the potion glowed eerily in the dark room.
